project.description:
Create an Ubuntu Desktop OVA for VMware Workstation/Fusion to get started with Vagrant in vCloud.
## Tools installed
* Ubuntu 14.04 Desktop * [Vagrant](http://vagrantup.com) * [vagrant-vcloud](https://github.com/frapposelli/vagrant-vcloud) Plugin to work with Vagrant in vCloud * rdesktop for the [`vagrant rdp`](https://docs.vagrantup.com/v2/cli/rdp.html) command * git to clone GitHub repos * rsync to use the synced folder feature of Vagrant to transfer files into the vCloud guests. * nodejs + npm to work with [grunt-jenkins](http://documentup.com/sghill/grunt-jenkins)
## Tests
The VM will be tested with [Serverspec](http://serverspec.org/) to check if all tools are installed correctly. The tests can be found in the [tests/*.rb](https://github.com/StefanScherer/vagrant-vcloud-box/tree/master/test) files.
## GitHub
This Jenkins job is built with the [StefanScherer/vagrant-vcloud-box](https://github.com/StefanScherer/vagrant-vcloud-box) GitHub Repo. See the README for more details.
